title: Chip 'N' Dale Rescue Rangers: Worldwide Rescue
description: Rescue Rangers Away!Disney's greatest furry flatfoots return in a globetrotting, action-packed adventure. Join Chip, Dale, Gadget, Monterey Jack and Zipper as they investigate an unknown force causing the world's animal population to go berserk. It's a cause that will push the Rescue Rangers to their limits when one of the Rangers' own is found keeping secrets from the rest of the team. Can they get to the bottom of this global mystery or will dissent in the ranks tear the Rangers apart forever? Find out as the Disney Afternoon Revolution continues with the biggest Rescue Rangers adventure ever told in WORLDWIDE RESCUE!
author: Ian Brill
